org.itsnat.comp.table

Interface ItsNatTableHeaderUI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ItsNatComponentUI, ItsNatElementComponentUI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ItsNatHTMLTableHeaderUI

    public interface ItsNatTableHeaderUI
extends ItsNatElementComponentUI
    Is the base interface of the User Interface of a table header.

    A table header is managed as a DOM element list, using the current table structure and renderer.

    Current implementation does not use the data model and relays heavily on ElementList.

    Author:
    Jose Maria Arranz Santamaria
    See Also:
    ItsNatTableHeader.getItsNatTableHeaderUI(), ItsNatTableHeader.getItsNatTableHeaderCellRenderer(), ItsNatTable.getItsNatTableStructure(), ElementList

        org.w3c.dom.Element getElementAt(int index)
        Returns the header column element at the specified index.

      • getContentElementAt

        org.w3c.dom.Element getContentElementAt(int index)
        Returns the "content" element, this element is used to render below the associated value of the header column element. This element is obtained using the current structure.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the element.
        Returns:
        the content element.

      • getItsNatTableHeaderCellUIAt

        ItsNatTableHeaderCellUI getItsNatTableHeaderCellUIAt(int index)
        Returns an object info of the header column element at the specified position.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the element to search for.
        Returns:
        the object info of the matched column element. Null if index is out of range.
        See Also:

      • getItsNatTableHeaderCellUIFromNode

        ItsNatTableHeaderCellUI getItsNatTableHeaderCellUIFromNode(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Returns an object info of the header column element containing the specified node (or the node is itself an element of the list).
        Parameters:
        node - the node to search for.
        Returns:
        the object info of the matched column element. Null if this node is not contained by the list.
        See Also:
        getItsNatTableHeaderCellUIAt(int), ElementListBase.getListElementInfoFromNode(Node)

      • isUsePatternMarkupToRender

        boolean isUsePatternMarkupToRender()
        Informs whether the original (saved as pattern) markup is used to render.

        The default value is defined by ItsNatDocument.isUsePatternMarkupToRender()

        Returns:
        true if the original markup is used.
        See Also:
        setUsePatternMarkupToRender(boolean)

      • setUsePatternMarkupToRender

        void setUsePatternMarkupToRender(boolean value)
        Sets whether the original (saved as pattern) markup is used to render.
        Parameters:
        value - true to enable the use of original markup to render.
        See Also:
        isUsePatternMarkupToRender()
